text: atarku avar (musavitam) kurinar: â€˜â€˜Nir enakku ettu varutankal velai ceyya ventumenra nipantanaiyin mitu ivviru penkalil oruttiyai nan umakku tirumanam ceytu kotukka virumpukiren. Nir ataip pattu varutankalaka mulumai ceytal, atu nir enakku ceyyum nanritan. Nan umakku (atikamana) ciramattaik kotukka virumpavillai. Allah natinal, nir ennai umakku upakariyakave kanpir'' (enrar)
